targets.rawSql:
select olt.nome as OLT, pon as 'Porta',count(onuid) as 'Autorizadas',
count(case when (status like '%online%' or status like '%working%') then onuid end) as 'Onlines',
count(case when status like '%offline%' then onuid end) as 'Offlines',
count(case when status like '%offline%' and reason like '%dying%' then onuid end) as 'Off p/ falta de energia',
count(case when status like '%offline%' and reason like '%los%' then onuid end) as 'Off p/ fibra rompida',
count(case when status like '%offline%' and reason like '%cmd%' then onuid end) as 'Off p/ cmd de reiniciar',
count(case when status like '%offline%' and reason like 'desconhecido' then onuid end) as 'Off p/ desconhecido'
from ftth_onu onu
inner join ftth_olt olt on (onu.olt_fk_id = olt.id)
where olt.nome in ("$olt") group by pon order by
    SUBSTRING_INDEX(pon, ' ', -3) + 0,
    SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(pon, ' ', -2), '/', -2) + 0,
    SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(pon, ' ', -1), '/', -1) + 0;

panels.title: Visão geral por Porta PON (Selecione uma OLT)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
	olt.nome AS OLT,
	onuid AS ONUID,
	pon AS PON,
	serial AS SN,
	description AS "DESCRIÇÃO",
	onurx AS ONURX,
	onutx AS ONUTX,
	oltrx AS OLTRX,
  fo.distance AS 'DISTANCIA',
  fo.model AS MODELO,
  fo.status AS STATUS,
	fo.reason AS 'ULT.MOT.OFF',
	DATE_FORMAT(fo.last_uptime, '%d-%m-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS 'ULT.VEZ.ONLINE',
	DATE_FORMAT(fo.last_downtime, '%d-%m-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS 'ULT.VEZ.OFFLINE',
	DATE_FORMAT(CONVERT_TZ(fo.timestamp, '+00:00', '-03:00'), '%d-%m-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS 'ULT.VERIFICACAO'
	FROM ftth_onu AS fo
	LEFT JOIN (
		SELECT foh.onu_fk_id, onurx, onutx, oltrx
		FROM ftth_onuhistory AS foh
		INNER JOIN (
			SELECT onu_fk_id, MAX(timestamp) AS max_timestamp
			FROM ftth_onuhistory
			GROUP BY onu_fk_id
		) AS foh_max ON foh.onu_fk_id = foh_max.onu_fk_id AND foh.timestamp = foh_max.max_timestamp
	) AS h ON fo.id = h.onu_fk_id inner join ftth_olt olt on (fo.olt_fk_id = olt.id) WHERE olt.nome LIKE "%$olt%" AND fo.status in ($onu_status)
	AND (fo.reason in ($reason) or fo.reason is null)
	ORDER BY
    SUBSTRING_INDEX(pon, ' ', -3) + 0,
    SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(pon, ' ', -2), '/', -2) + 0,
    SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(pon, ' ', -1), '/', -1) + 0;;
select serial AS SERIAL,count(id) TOTAL from ftth_onu group by serial having count(serial) > 1 order by total desc;

select 
olt.nome AS OLT,
onuid AS ONUID,
pon AS PON,
serial AS SN,
description AS 'DESCRIÇÃO',
distance AS 'DISTANCIA',
model AS MODELO,
status AS STATUS,
reason AS 'ULT.MOT.OFF',
DATE_FORMAT(last_uptime, '%d-%m-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS 'ULT.VEZ.ONLINE',
DATE_FORMAT(last_downtime, '%d-%m-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS 'ULT.VEZ.OFFLINE',
DATE_FORMAT(CONVERT_TZ(timestamp, '+00:00', '-03:00'), '%d-%m-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS 'ULT.VERIFICACAO'
from ftth_onu onu
INNER JOIN ftth_olt olt ON (olt.id = onu.olt_fk_id)
where serial in (select serial from ftth_onu group by serial having count(serial) > 1) order by serial desc;

select olt.nome AS OLT,onuid AS ONUID,pon AS PON,serial AS SN,model AS MODELO,status AS STATUS,distance AS DISTANCIA,reason AS 'ULT.MOT.OFF',onu.timestamp AS 'ULT.VERIFICAÇÃO'
FROM ftth_onu onu
INNER JOIN ftth_olt olt on (onu.olt_fk_id = olt.id)
WHERE serial in ("$serial") AND olt.nome like '%$olt%';

SELECT
  t1.timestamp,
  t1.onurx AS "$serial-OnuRx",
  t2.onutx AS "$serial-OnuTx"
FROM (
  SELECT foh.timestamp, onurx
  FROM ftth_onuhistory foh
  INNER JOIN ftth_onu fo ON (fo.id = foh.onu_fk_id)
  INNER JOIN ftth_olt olt ON (olt.id = foh.olt_fk_id)
  WHERE serial = "$serial" AND olt.nome like '%$olt%'
) t1
JOIN (
  SELECT foh.timestamp, onutx
  FROM ftth_onuhistory foh
  INNER JOIN ftth_onu fo ON (fo.id = foh.onu_fk_id)
  INNER JOIN ftth_olt olt ON (olt.id = foh.olt_fk_id)
  WHERE serial = "$serial" AND olt.nome like '%$olt%'
) t2 ON t1.timestamp = t2.timestamp WHERE $__timeFilter(t1.timestamp);

panels.title: Verificação de Historico de Sinal por SN - ($serial)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  t1.timestamp,
  t1.onurx AS "$serial-OnuRx",
  t2.onutx AS "$serial-OnuTx"
FROM (
  SELECT foh.timestamp, onurx
  FROM ftth_onuhistory foh
  INNER JOIN ftth_onu fo ON (fo.id = foh.onu_fk_id)
  INNER JOIN ftth_olt olt ON (olt.id = foh.olt_fk_id)
  WHERE serial = "$serial" AND olt.nome like '%$olt%'
) t1
JOIN (
  SELECT foh.timestamp, onutx
  FROM ftth_onuhistory foh
  INNER JOIN ftth_onu fo ON (fo.id = foh.onu_fk_id)
  INNER JOIN ftth_olt olt ON (olt.id = foh.olt_fk_id)
  WHERE serial = "$serial" AND olt.nome like '%$olt%'
) t2 ON t1.timestamp = t2.timestamp;

panels.title: Verificação de Historico de Sinal por SN - ($serial)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  olt.nome AS OLT,
  fo.onuid AS ONUID,
  fo.pon AS PON,
  fo.serial AS SN,
  fo.description AS "DESCRIÇÃO",
  foh.onurx AS ONURX,
  foh.oltrx AS OLTRX,
  foh.onutx AS ONUTX,
  fo.distance AS 'DISTANCIA',
  fo.model AS MODELO,
  fo.version AS VERSAO,
  fo.status AS STATUS,
  fo.reason AS 'ULT.MOT.OFF',
  DATE_FORMAT(fo.last_uptime, '%d-%m-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS 'ULT.VEZ.ONLINE',
  DATE_FORMAT(fo.last_downtime, '%d-%m-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS 'ULT.VEZ.OFFLINE',
  DATE_FORMAT(CONVERT_TZ(fo.timestamp, '+00:00', '-03:00'), '%d-%m-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS 'ULT.VERIFICACAO'
FROM
  ftth_onu AS fo
  INNER JOIN ftth_olt AS olt ON (fo.olt_fk_id = olt.id)
  LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT
      onu_fk_id,
      onurx,
      oltrx,
      onutx
    FROM
      ftth_onuhistory
    WHERE
      timestamp = (
        SELECT
          MAX(timestamp)
        FROM
          ftth_onuhistory AS foh_inner
        WHERE
          foh_inner.onu_fk_id = ftth_onuhistory.onu_fk_id
      )
  ) AS foh ON fo.id = foh.onu_fk_id
WHERE
  (foh.onurx BETWEEN -39 AND -30 AND onurx != -40)
  AND foh.onutx IS NOT NULL
  AND olt.nome LIKE '%$olt%'
  AND olt.nome IN (
    SELECT
      nome
    FROM
      ftth_olt
    WHERE
      nome LIKE '%$olt%'
  )
ORDER BY
  SUBSTRING_INDEX(pon, ' ', -3) + 0,
  SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(pon, ' ', -2), '/', -2) + 0,
  SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(pon, ' ', -1), '/', -1) + 0;

panels.title: Painel de Análise ONU (<=-30) - Sinal ruim

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  olt.nome AS OLT,
  fo.onuid AS ONUID,
  fo.pon AS PON,
  fo.serial AS SN,
  fo.description AS "DESCRIÇÃO",
  foh.onurx AS ONURX,
  foh.oltrx AS OLTRX,
  foh.onutx AS ONUTX,
  fo.distance AS 'DISTANCIA',
  fo.model AS MODELO,
  fo.version AS VERSAO,
  fo.status AS STATUS,
  fo.reason AS 'ULT.MOT.OFF',
  DATE_FORMAT(fo.last_uptime, '%d-%m-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS 'ULT.VEZ.ONLINE',
  DATE_FORMAT(fo.last_downtime, '%d-%m-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS 'ULT.VEZ.OFFLINE',
  DATE_FORMAT(CONVERT_TZ(fo.timestamp, '+00:00', '-03:00'), '%d-%m-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS 'ULT.VERIFICACAO'
FROM
  ftth_onu AS fo
  INNER JOIN ftth_olt AS olt ON (fo.olt_fk_id = olt.id)
  LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT
      onu_fk_id,
      onurx,
      oltrx,
      onutx
    FROM
      ftth_onuhistory
    WHERE
      timestamp = (
        SELECT
          MAX(timestamp)
        FROM
          ftth_onuhistory AS foh_inner
        WHERE
          foh_inner.onu_fk_id = ftth_onuhistory.onu_fk_id
      )
  ) AS foh ON fo.id = foh.onu_fk_id
WHERE
  (foh.onurx BETWEEN -29 AND -27 AND onurx != -40)
  AND foh.onutx IS NOT NULL
  AND olt.nome LIKE '%$olt%'
  AND olt.nome IN (
    SELECT
      nome
    FROM
      ftth_olt
    WHERE
      nome LIKE '%$olt%'
  )
ORDER BY
  SUBSTRING_INDEX(pon, ' ', -3) + 0,
  SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(pon, ' ', -2), '/', -2) + 0,
  SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(pon, ' ', -1), '/', -1) + 0;

panels.title: Painel de Análise ONU (<=-27) - Alerta de sinal

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  olt.nome AS OLT,
  fo.onuid AS ONUID,
  fo.pon AS PON,
  fo.serial AS SN,
  fo.description AS "DESCRIÇÃO",
  foh.onurx AS ONURX,
  foh.oltrx AS OLTRX,
  foh.onutx AS ONUTX,
  fo.distance AS 'DISTANCIA',
  fo.model AS MODELO,
  fo.version AS VERSAO,
  fo.status AS STATUS,
  fo.reason AS 'ULT.MOT.OFF',
  DATE_FORMAT(fo.last_uptime, '%d-%m-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS 'ULT.VEZ.ONLINE',
  DATE_FORMAT(fo.last_downtime, '%d-%m-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS 'ULT.VEZ.OFFLINE',
  DATE_FORMAT(CONVERT_TZ(fo.timestamp, '+00:00', '-03:00'), '%d-%m-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS 'ULT.VERIFICACAO'
FROM
  ftth_onu AS fo
  INNER JOIN ftth_olt AS olt ON (fo.olt_fk_id = olt.id)
  LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT
      onu_fk_id,
      onurx,
      oltrx,
      onutx
    FROM
      ftth_onuhistory
    WHERE
      timestamp = (
        SELECT
          MAX(timestamp)
        FROM
          ftth_onuhistory AS foh_inner
        WHERE
          foh_inner.onu_fk_id = ftth_onuhistory.onu_fk_id
      )
  ) AS foh ON fo.id = foh.onu_fk_id
WHERE
  (foh.onurx = -40 or onurx = 0)
  AND foh.onutx IS NOT NULL
  AND olt.nome LIKE '%$olt%'
  AND olt.nome IN (
    SELECT
      nome
    FROM
      ftth_olt
    WHERE
      nome LIKE '%$olt%'
  )
ORDER BY
  SUBSTRING_INDEX(pon, ' ', -3) + 0,
  SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(pon, ' ', -2), '/', -2) + 0,
  SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(pon, ' ', -1), '/', -1) + 0;

panels.title: Painel de Análise ONU (<=-40) - Sem sinal

targets.rawSql:
SELECT olt.nome AS OLT,
	fo.onuid AS ONUID,
	fo.pon AS PON, serial AS SN,
	fo.description AS "DESCRIÇÃO",
	onurx AS ONURX,
	onutx AS ONUTX,
	oltrx AS OLTRX,
	fo.distance AS DISTANCIA,
	fo.model AS MODELO,
	fo.status AS STATUS,
	fo.reason AS 'ULT.MOT.OFF',
	DATE_FORMAT(fo.last_uptime, '%d-%m-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS 'ULT.VEZ.ONLINE',
	DATE_FORMAT(fo.last_downtime, '%d-%m-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS 'ULT.VEZ.OFFLINE',
	DATE_FORMAT(CONVERT_TZ(fo.timestamp, '+00:00', '-03:00'), '%d-%m-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS 'ULT.VERIFICACAO'
	FROM ftth_onu AS fo
	LEFT JOIN (
		SELECT foh.onu_fk_id, onurx, onutx, oltrx
		FROM ftth_onuhistory AS foh
		INNER JOIN (
			SELECT onu_fk_id, MAX(timestamp) AS max_timestamp
			FROM ftth_onuhistory
			GROUP BY onu_fk_id
		) AS foh_max ON foh.onu_fk_id = foh_max.onu_fk_id AND foh.timestamp = foh_max.max_timestamp
	) AS h ON fo.id = h.onu_fk_id inner join ftth_olt olt on (fo.olt_fk_id = olt.id) WHERE olt.nome LIKE "%$olt%" AND fo.status in ($onu_status)
	AND (fo.reason in ($reason) or fo.reason is null) AND fo.pon in ($pon)
	ORDER BY
  SUBSTRING_INDEX(pon, ' ', -3) + 0,
  SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(pon, ' ', -2), '/', -2) + 0,
  SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(pon, ' ', -1), '/', -1) + 0;

list.definition:
select pon from ftth_onu onu
inner join ftth_olt olt on (onu.olt_fk_id = olt.id)
where olt.nome like '%$olt%'
order by
SUBSTRING_INDEX(pon, ' ', -3) + 0,
SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(pon, ' ', -2), '/', -2) + 0,
SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(pon, ' ', -1), '/', -1) + 0;

SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(pon, ' ', -1), '/', -1) + 0;
